sentences.sContent: If water had a negative index of refraction, then a straw placed in a glass would appear to bend back under itself.
sentences.sContent_eng: If water had a negative index of refraction, then a straw placed in a glass would appear to bend back under itself.
sentences.sCn: 如果水具有负折射率，那么放在玻璃杯中的吸管似乎可能弯曲到自身下方。

sentences.sContent: With all that reflection and refraction, modernism creates the illusion that there is an illusion when in fact it is a straightforward statement of money and power.
sentences.sContent_eng: With all that reflection and refraction, modernism creates the illusion that there is an illusion when in fact it is a straightforward statement of money and power.
sentences.sCn: 通过反射和折射，现代主义创造了一个幻觉存在的假象，而实际上它是对金钱和权力不加掩饰的声明。

sentences.sContent: Rapidly changing refraction due to turbulence along the line of sight affects different colors of light by different amounts and generally produces a twinkling effect for stars.
sentences.sContent_eng: Rapidly changing refraction due to turbulence along the line of sight affects different colors of light by different amounts and generally produces a twinkling effect for stars.
sentences.sCn: 由于湍流而快速变化的折射在视线中会影响到光的不同颜色，这种影响也各不相同，一般会给恒星产生一种闪烁的效果。

words.tran: 折射的；有折射力的；能折射的
[光] 折射率；折射性；[物] 折射本领
